entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
